item.description:
HI Everyone,

You are invited to my apartment in Hartford to watch the Super Chef Battle at the Whitehouse on my supersized TV. The show begins at 8 PM. Let's meet at 6:30 PM for dinner since it's a Sunday night. Please bring a dish to share. Anything goes and cooking is either here or beforehand if you need more than 1 hour. There is plenty of parking in front of my building. I will give my address to "YES" RSVPers the day before.

This should be fun! See you then.

HAPPY NEW YEAR
Karen :)
item.name: Super Chef Battle at the Whitehouse at Karen's
